==Chinese==
{{zh-forms|alt=𠖌,𠙙,𠜍,𢃙}}

===Glyph origin===
{{Han etym}}
{{Han compound|冖|元|寸|ls=psc|c1=s|c2=p|c3=s|t1=hat|t2=head|t3=hand}} – a hand putting a hat on the head. Also {{liushu|ic|nocap=1|adj=y}}.

Earlier forms are {{Han compound|冃|元|ls=psc|c1=s|c2=p|t1=hat|nocap=1|adj=y}}.

===Etymology===
From {{inh|zh|sit-pro|*(g/k)wa-n||to put on; to wear; to clothe}}. Cognate with {{cog|bo|བགོ||to put on; to wear; clothing}}, {{m|bo|གོས||clothes; garments; dress}}, {{m|bo|གོན}}, {{m|bo|གྱོན||to put on; to wear}}, {{m|bo|སྐོན||to dress; to clothe}}.
